price: 否认我的迹象，而且自欺的民众，其譬喻真恶劣！
arabic: سَآءَ مَثَلًا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَأَنفُسَهُمۡ كَانُواْ يَظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: sāa mathalan al-qawmu alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā wa-anfusahum kānū yaẓlimūna
